LanguageData.UT_OrganicArm.label: arm
LanguageData.UT_OrganicArm.description: A biological human arm. Attached to the shoulder, it allows the body to carry and manipulate things.
LanguageData.UT_OrganicLeg.label: leg
LanguageData.UT_OrganicLeg.description: A biological human leg. Attached to the pelvis, it allows the body to move.
LanguageData.UT_OrganicStomach.label: stomach
LanguageData.UT_OrganicStomach.description: A biological human stomach. Breaks down food into nutrients with acids and enzymes.
LanguageData.UT_OrganicEye.label: eye
LanguageData.UT_OrganicEye.description: A biological human eye. Converts light into electrical signals and transmits them to the brain.
LanguageData.UT_OrganicEar.label: ear
LanguageData.UT_OrganicEar.description: A biological human ear. Converts vibrations in the air into electrical signals and transmits them to the brain.
LanguageData.UT_OrganicNose.label: nose
LanguageData.UT_OrganicNose.description: A biological human nose. Recognizes and identifies smells in thr air and transmits them to the brain.
